title: I will be back...
review: we all know the star cast ,,n how it meant to be a fully packed action movie..it was fun to watch this one ,,,i really felt thankingsly for bringing all my childhood action stars on common platform...including chuck ( and humour part along)n jean Claude is icing on the cake....also it is niceto see Arnie back in action ,,,,hahaha,,,there is a scene where bruce is driving nano type car n calling Arnie to get in,,,Arnie says his shoes are bigger than this car,,,,guys..just go to watch all action heroes together ,,i doubt we will get another chance to see such kinda combination ever...
